{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=RE6500 |revision=(HG) |asin=B00KTLG9AK |fcc_date=04/24/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WST-C41L |manuf_rev=N02 R1.0 |availability=common |type=range extender, audio streamer |fcc_id=Q87-RE6500 |ic_id=3839A-RE6500 |pcb_id=0500-2540411000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Audio Hub (Codec);Wolfson;WM8960;;1; |flags=Audio out (3.5 mm) |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1200 MAX Wi-Fi Range Extender}} :[http://www.linksys.com/gb/p/P-RE6500/ Product Page]
"0500-2540411000" and "1436" (09/2014) is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [http://www.u-media.com.tw/content/product/Wi-Fi.php ''U-MEDIA''] WST-C41L N02 R1.0 (see also [[U-MEDIA WST-385L|WST-385L]])
{{WiFiCert|WFA53443|06/26/2014}} {{see also|Linksys RE6500HG|U-MEDIA}}
===Wikis=== *[http://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/re6500 ''Linksys RE6500'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] (PCB images)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32516-linksys-re6500-ac1200-max-wi-fi-range-extender-reviewed?start=1 ''Linksys RE6500 AC1200 MAX Wi-Fi Range Extender'' on '''SNB'''] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz [[MIPS32|MIPS 1004Kc]] :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L6406E 8MB (SPI SOP8) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWQD (64MB DDR2) :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7602E 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E 2T2R 802.11ac :Audio: ''Wolfson'' [http://www.wolfsonmicro.com/products/audio-hubs-%28codecs%29/stereo-low-power-codecs/wm8960/ WM8960] Audio Hub (Codec)
